item.title: Canada Is About to Lose Its Status as Having Eliminated Measles
item.description: One province with an outsized number of cases has seen a collision of politics and public health policy.

item.title: Russia Close to Its Biggest Capture of a Ukrainian City Since 2023
item.description: The Kremlin is focusing its fire on Pokrovsk, a gateway to the Donetsk region, which Russia’s president, Vladimir V. Putin, has long coveted.

item.title: The U.S. Is Skipping This Year’s Climate Summit. For Many, That’s OK.
item.description: World leaders, gathering in Brazil, will try to agree on new, more ambitious plans to cut greenhouse gases.

item.title: Students Find Hope at This Makeshift School in Gaza
item.description: In central Gaza, a makeshift school called Hope Makers is providing their young students, aged from five to twelve years old, psychological support to...

item.title: COP30 U.N. Climate Talks Are Starting in Brazil. Here’s What to Know.
item.description: Diplomats and leaders from around the world are gathering on the edge of the Amazon rainforest for annual talks on how to limit global warming.
